meanings.definition: A gland surrounding the neck of the bladder in male mammals and releasing a fluid component of semen.
meanings.sent2: The doctor checked his prostate during the exam.
meanings.sent3: The prostate decided to throw a party for the bladder.
meanings.sent4: His prostate was a silent worker, like a hidden gem in the body.
meanings.sent5: The prostate, like a loyal friend, always supports male health.

meanings.definition: An inflammation of the prostate gland.
meanings.sent2: He had to take medication for his inflamed prostate.
meanings.sent3: The prostate's protest against inflammation was heard loud and clear.
meanings.sent4: The inflamed prostate felt like a fiery furnace inside him.
meanings.sent5: The swollen prostate was a red flag for his health.
